meanings.definition: To take an excessive or dangerous amount of a drug or medication.
meanings.sent1: He overdosed on painkillers and had to go to the hospital.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally overdosed on her prescription medication.
meanings.sent3: The cat overdosed on catnip and fell asleep in the flowerpot.
meanings.sent4: His love for chocolate was so strong, he overdosed on it every day.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overdosing on medication can be severe and life-threatening.

meanings.definition: To experience an overdose of a drug or medication.
meanings.sent1: After taking too many pills, he overdosed and passed out.
meanings.sent2: She overdosed on cough syrup and felt very sick.
meanings.sent3: The robot accidentally overdosed on oil and started malfunctioning.
meanings.sent4: The town overdosed on excitement when the circus came to visit.
meanings.sent5: The actor pretended to overdose on stage for the dramatic scene.
